content.en: Surgical algorithm advancements: Researchers are exploring the use of algorithms to improve surgical accuracy and navigation in laparoscopic procedures. These algorithms are being used to develop new methods for registering ultrasound images, creating 3D image datasets, estimating errors during surgery, and developing augmented reality guidance systems. The goal is to enhance the surgeon's view and provide real-time guidance during procedures, ultimately improving patient outcomes.
content.da: Fremskridt inden for kirurgiske algoritmer: Forskere undersøger brugen af algoritmer til at forbedre kirurgisk nøjagtighed og navigation i laparoskopiske procedurer. Disse algoritmer bruges til at udvikle nye metoder til registrering af ultralydsbilleder, skabe 3D-billeddatasæt, estimere fejl under operationer og udvikle augmented reality-guidesystemer. Målet er at forbedre kirurgens udsyn og give realtidsvejledning under procedurer, hvilket i sidste ende forbedrer patientresultaterne.
